review: This is my third Amazon Fire product (I tried two Amazon Fire Sticks first). Let me preface this review by saying I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, and am currently working on my Master's degree, so I am no stranger to technology. I have the fastest Internet in my area, with download speeds consistently over 50Mbps. I primarily use Hulu Plus on the Fire TV. But I've ran into the exact same problems with both Fire Sticks and now the Fire TV. It will work fine for awhile, and then freeze in the middle of a program. Sometimes the audio will continue to play, while the picture is frozen. Sometimes, when returning from an ad, the audio on my show will play, and the picture will be black. There is no reason for this. I even took the drastic step of moving my router and modem next to the Fire TV, so I could give it a wired ethernet connection. It didn't help one bit. I love the idea of the Fire Stick and Fire TV, but there are some serious problems with both. With the frustration that they have caused me, I regret ever buying one.
